details: A powerful medicine whenever ENLARGED GLANDS are present. Hodgkin's disease.A valuable skin remedy. Has a specific affinity for the breast; very useful in the dissipation of breast tumors. ECZEMA OF THE EAR. Pruritus vaginae. Lupoid ulceration. SCROFULOUS SWELLINGS. (CISTUS.) PAINFUL HEMORRHOIDS. Tubercular testis. Epithelioma. Nodosities in the breasts. (SCIRRHINUM.) Pain in all flexor muscles.

Respiratory: Violent dyspnoea, oppression of chest with trembling
Head: Vertigo felt in vertex, greater when standing; drowsiness; pain from forehead to back of head
Crusta lactea
Eczema behind ear
Abdomen: Pain in sigmoid flexure and RECTUM
Sleep: GREAT DROWSINESS; in morning and before and after meals with weariness
Skin: Prickling, itching, worse back of hand

name: Scrophularia nodosa
dosage: Tincture and first potency. Apply locally to cancerous glands also SEMPER. VIV.
